title: Board of Veterinary Medicine - Examinations
cleaned_text: You must contact American Association of Veterinary State Boards (AAVSB) directly in order to register for the VTNE examinations. Exam dates and application are available at their website at [www.aavsb.org](http://www.aavsb.org/). Once you have taken and passed the VTNE exam, you may submit an application for licensure as a Veterinary
